price: until when he reached [a valley] between the two mountains, he found beyond them a people who could barely understand a word[47].
arabic: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا بَلَغَ بَيۡنَ ٱلسَّدَّيۡنِ وَجَدَ مِن دُونِهِمَا قَوۡمٗا لَّا يَكَادُونَ يَفۡقَهُونَ قَوۡلٗا
footnotes: [47] They could not speak except their own language.
